info.brief_description: Modern Family with a HUGE twist!
info.description:
Something strange happens to once of the female characters of the TV show "Modern Family".The strange event giving one of them the ability to control sizes in various ways. Follow your favorite female character around in this story as she causes mayhem and destruction to not only her family, but to anything she may so desire!

Characters allowed to be giantesses:

1: Claire

2: Haley

3: Alex

4. Gloria


Rules:
         1: Spelling, grammar and punctuation. You don't have to be perfect, just make readable. If I feel it is too bad, I will delete it.

         2: One giantess character must be alive at all times. For example, if Gloria kills off Claire, Haley and Alex, then Gloria cannot die.

         3: You can have more than one giantess. Just leave it as a choice to grow the character or not.

         4: No short chapters. Chapters involving choices are fine, I just mean chapters like: "Alex tossed Claire into her mouth and swallowed. Now what does she do?"

         5: Minimal incest. Tried to keep it reasonable. No all-out graphic incest. Gloria is a different story. Since she's not blood-related, she can do whatever she wants.

         6: No underage children. Characters such as Lily and other underage characters are not allowed. Due to the purpose of this story, they do not exist.

I do reward gift points. The amount rewarded is equal to the quality of the chapter(s). The better quality and length will equal more gift points.

Minimal rewarded per chapter: 50 gift points.

Maximum rewarded per chapter: 1,000 gift points
